member.name: T:RC.Gmail.GmailAtomFeed
member.summary: Provides an easy method of retreiving and programming against gmail atom feeds. Based on http://archive.msdn.microsoft.com/CSharpGmail and further refined.

member.name: M:RC.Gmail.GmailAtomFeed.#ctor(System.String,System.String)
member.summary:
Constructor, creates the gmail atom feed object.
Creating the object does not get the feed, the GetFeed method must be called to get the current feed.
member.param: The username of the gmail account that the message will be sent through
The password of the gmail account that the message will be sent through

member.name: M:RC.Gmail.GmailAtomFeed.GetFeed
member.summary:
Gets the current atom feed for the specified account and loads all properties and collections with the feed data. Any existing data will be replaced by the new feed.
If the FeedLabel property equals string.Empty the feed for the inbox will be retreived.
Returns wether login succeeded.

member.name: M:RC.Gmail.GmailAtomFeed.loadFeedEntries
member.summary: Loads the FeedEntries collection from the data retreived in the feed.

member.name: P:RC.Gmail.GmailAtomFeed.FeedEntries
member.summary: Collection containing the feeds entry objects

member.name: P:RC.Gmail.GmailAtomFeed.GmailUserName
member.summary: The username of the gmail account that the message will be sent through

member.name: P:RC.Gmail.GmailAtomFeed.GmailPassword
member.summary: The password of the gmail account that the message will be sent through

member.name: P:RC.Gmail.GmailAtomFeed.FeedLabel
member.summary: The label to retreive the feeds from. To get the new inbox messages set this to string.Empty.

member.name: P:RC.Gmail.GmailAtomFeed.FeedXml
member.summary: Returns the feed data retreived from gmail

member.name: P:RC.Gmail.GmailAtomFeed.RawFeed
member.summary: Returns the feed data retreived from gmail

member.name: P:RC.Gmail.GmailAtomFeed.Message
member.summary: Returns the /feed/tagline property

member.name: P:RC.Gmail.GmailAtomFeed.Title
member.summary: Returns the /feed/title property

member.name: P:RC.Gmail.GmailAtomFeed.Modified
member.summary: Returns the /feed/modified property

member.name: P:RC.Gmail.GmailAtomFeed.FeedUrl
member.summary: Base Url for the gmail atom feed, the default is "https://gmail.google.com/gmail/feed/atom"

member.name: T:RC.Gmail.GmailAtomFeed.AtomFeedEntry
member.summary: Class for storing the /feed/entry items

member.name: M:RC.Gmail.GmailAtomFeed.AtomFeedEntry.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.DateTime)
member.summary: Constructor, loads the object

member.name: P:RC.Gmail.GmailAtomFeed.AtomFeedEntry.Subject
member.summary: Returns the /feed/entry/title property

member.name: P:RC.Gmail.GmailAtomFeed.AtomFeedEntry.Summary
member.summary: Returns the /feed/entry/summary property

member.name: P:RC.Gmail.GmailAtomFeed.AtomFeedEntry.FromName
member.summary: Returns the /feed/entry/author/name property

member.name: P:RC.Gmail.GmailAtomFeed.AtomFeedEntry.FromEmail
member.summary: Returns the /feed/entry/author/email property

member.name: P:RC.Gmail.GmailAtomFeed.AtomFeedEntry.Id
member.summary: Returns the /feed/entry/id property

member.name: P:RC.Gmail.GmailAtomFeed.AtomFeedEntry.Link
member.summary: Returns the /feed/entry/link/href value

member.name: P:RC.Gmail.GmailAtomFeed.AtomFeedEntry.Received
member.summary: Returns the /feed/entry/issued property

member.name: T:RC.Gmail.GmailAtomFeed.AtomFeedEntryCollection
member.summary: Collection of AtomFeedEntry objects

member.name: M:RC.Gmail.GmailAtomFeed.AtomFeedEntryCollection.Add(RC.Gmail.GmailAtomFeed.AtomFeedEntry)
member.summary: Adds an AtomFeedEntry object to the collection

member.name: M:RC.Gmail.GmailAtomFeed.AtomFeedEntryCollection.Clear
member.summary: Clears the collection

member.summary: Returns true if the collection contains the specified object

member.name: M:RC.Gmail.GmailAtomFeed.AtomFeedEntryCollection.IndexOf(RC.Gmail.GmailAtomFeed.AtomFeedEntry)
member.summary: Returns the position of the first of the AtomFeedEntry object. If it is not found then -1 is returned.

member.summary: Inserts an AtomFeedEntry at the specified position

member.summary: Removes an AtomFeedEntry from the collection

member.name: M:RC.Gmail.GmailAtomFeed.AtomFeedEntryCollection.RemoveAt(System.Int32)
member.summary: Removes an AtomFeedEntry object from the specified position
member.param: Position of AtomFeedEntry to be removed

member.name: P:RC.Gmail.GmailAtomFeed.AtomFeedEntryCollection.Item(System.Int32)
